  • Class
    Description
    AdminEventDetailFragment
    AdmenEventDetailFragment - this fragment is displayed when an admin selects an event Admins can view the details and delete the event.
    AdminUserDetailFragment
    AdminUserDetailFragment - this fragment is displayed when an admin selects a user Admins can view the details and delete the user.
    AdminViewEventsFragment
    AdminViewEventsFragment - This fragment is displayed when an admin user wants to view all the events.
    AdminViewImagesFragment
    AdminViewImagesFragment - This fragment displays all images uploaded to the app.
    AdminViewModel
    Class that just contains the selected even for an admin user
    AdminViewNotificationsFragment
    AdminViewNotificationsFragment - Fragment displays all notifications sent to users.
    AdminViewUsersFragment
    AdminViewUsersFragment - Fragment displays all user profiles
    ImageCardAdapter
    ImageCardAdapter - Custom card adapter to display images
    ImageCardAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Interface for handling item click events in the adapter.
    UserCardAdapter
    UserCardAdapter - Custom user card adapter to be used to display users for admins to manage.
